WorkItem.Description:
When we 
add data validation(list) to a cell using a formula like =INDIRECT(M1), (M1 cell has the value M2:M7)
and save the excel file as EXCEL5
the cell shows a drop down arrow but when we click on the cell the drop down list is not show

When we open the excel file and inspect the data validation and press "OK", the data validation (drop down) starts working.

This issue is not observed when we save the file in excel 2007
WorkItem.Summary: Data validation list using formula and saving in Excel 5 fails
